item.description:
River Valley
Location: Performing Arts Center at Simsbury Meadows
*
Simsbury, CT 06103
Date(s): June 26., 2009
Time(s): 7:30 p.m.
Category: Performing Art
Description: Pack a picnic dinner and come enjory Rhythm, Blues and Soul with David Foster and the Mohegan All Stars feat Maceo Parker.
Admission: $5-$25.
Phone: (860) 244-2999

The HSO outdoor music series begins Friday, June 26 with “Summer Groove – Rhythm, Blues & Soul,” a celebration of the 40thanniversary of Woodstock. David Foster assembled a group of talented musicians from the legendary Shaboo Night Club that went on to become one of the best known bands in Connecticut. The Shaboo is gone but the music has lived on! Foster and friends are still cranking out their trademark rhythm, blues and soul music, now as the house band for the Mohegan Sun Casino.

Gates open at 6:00 p.m. for all Talcott Mountain Music FestivalSM concerts. Concerts are held rain or shine. The festival site is located on Iron Horse Boulevard, parallel to Hopmeadow Street (Rt. 10/202), in downtown Simsbury.

The Hartford Symphony Education Tent, open to all ticket holders, is open from 6:00 p.m. to 7:15 p.m. Children can enjoy free activities such as face-painting, crafts, games and the “Instrument Zoo.”


INDIVIDUAL CONCERTS: Adult Lawn Tickets: $20 in advance, $25 at the gate. Tickets for Kids 12 & under: $5. Single Table Seats (per seat): $40 in advance, $45 at the gate. Full Table (8 seats): $320 in advance, $360 at the gate.

GRASS PASSES: (10 lawn tickets to be used in any combination for any of the five concerts) Adult GRASS PASSES: $200 GRASS PASSES for Kids 12 and under: $50. New this year - Special Family Package: 12 lawn tickets – 6 kids and 6 adults: $150.

SERIES SUBSCRIPTIONS: Five-Concert subscriptions for single table seats: $190 per seat (save $10 off individual concert price). Five-Concert subscriptions for full eight-seat tables: $1,420 per table (save $180 off individual concert price).

Prices include a $2 per adult ticket and 50¢ per child ticket facility fee paid to the Performing Arts Center at Simsbury Meadows

Tickets available at (860) 244-2999 or www.talcottmountain.org. On-site box office opens June 1.

Also available through HSO Ticket Services.
Call 860-244-2999
Monday - Friday, 10am-5pm
item.how_to_find_us: Phone # will go out a day before to Yeses Fee is $20.00 Bring a picnic
